AT.name: Mega Man™ 4
AT.description: Ein Jahr nach den Ereignissen von Mega Man™ 3 lebt die Welt noch immer in Frieden. Doch der mysteriöse Dr. Cossack plant, Mega Man zu beseitigen und der größte Roboterkonstrukteur aller Zeiten zu werden. Es liegt mal wieder an Mega Man, die Welt zu retten! Mega Man 4 bietet noch kniffligere Jump'n'Run-Action und acht neue Superroboter, die besiegt werden müssen. Mega Man kann jetzt seinen Mega Buster aufladen, um mächtigere Feuerstöße abzuschießen. Wenn du diesen Titel bereits auf deiner Wii™ erworben hast, führe einen System-Transfer von deiner Wii auf deine Wii U™ durch, um ein Upgrade-Sonderangebot zu erhalten. Hierbei handelt es sich um die US-Version des Spiels.

AU.name: Mega Man™ 4
AU.description: A year after the events of Mega Man™ 3, the world is still at peace. However, mysterious scientist Dr. Cossack announces his plan to eliminate Mega Man, and prove himself to be the greatest robot designer of all time. It's up to Mega Man to save the day once again! Mega Man 4 provides even more fiendish platform-action gameplay and eight new robot masters to defeat. Mega Man now also has his Mega Buster to charge up energy, allowing him to fire larger and more damaging blasts. If you own this title on your Wii™, perform a system transfer from your Wii to your Wii U™ to receive a special upgrade price. This is the US version of the game.

BG.name: Mega Man™ 4
BG.description: A year after the events of Mega Man™ 3, the world is still at peace. Mega Man 4 provides even more fiendish platform-action gameplay and eight new robot masters to defeat. Mega Man now also has his Mega Buster to charge up energy, allowing him to fire larger and more damaging blasts. If you own this title on your Wii™, perform a system transfer from your Wii to your Wii U™ to receive a special upgrade price. This is the US version of the game.

BE.name: Mega Man™ 4
BE.description: Un an après les événements de Mega Man™ 3, le monde est toujours en paix. Mais le Dr. Cossack annonce son projet d'éliminer Mega Man afin de prouver qu'il est le plus grand créateur de robots de tous les temps. Mega Man va devoir se battre à nouveau ! Mega Man 4 est un jeu de plateformes et d'action palpitant avec huit nouveaux boss à vaincre. Désormais, vous pourrez charger votre Mega Buster pour des tirs encore plus puissants et destructeurs ! Si vous possédez ce titre sur votre Wii, faites un transfert Wii™ vers votre Wii U™ afin d'obtenir la version améliorée à un prix spécial ! Ceci est la version américaine du jeu.

ES.name: Mega Man™ 4
ES.description: Un año después de Mega Man™ 3, el mundo sigue su curso. En las sombras, el misterioso Dr. Cossack quiere acabar con Mega Man de una vez por todas para proclamarse el mejor diseñador de robots de todos los tiempos. ¡El destino del mundo vuelve a estar en manos de Mega Man! Mega Man 4 es un juego de plataformas cargado de acción en el que deberás vencer a ocho malvados robots. Mega Man también cuenta con su Mega Buster para cargar energía, lo que le permite disparar rayos más potentes y a mayor distancia. Si posees este título en tu Wii™, puedes realizar una transferencia de datos de Wii a Wii U™ y obtener una actualización a un precio especial. Esta es la versión estadounidense del juego.

IT.name: Mega Man™ 4
IT.description: Un anno dopo gli avvenimenti di Mega Man™ 3, nel mondo regna ancora la pace. Improvvisamente, il misterioso scienziato Dr. Cossack compare sulla scena e annuncia il suo piano: eliminare Mega Man e dimostrare di essere il più grande creatore di robot di tutti i tempi. Anche questa volta, Mega Man è il solo a poter salvare le sorti del mondo intero! Mega Man 4 è un gioco d'azione e piattaforme con otto nuovi Robot Master da sconfiggere. In questo titolo, il nostro eroe dispone anche di un nuovo Mega demolitore, in grado di accumulare energia, che gli permette di sparare colpi ancora più potenti. Se possiedi questo titolo sulla tua console Wii™, effettua un trasferimento dati su Wii U™ per potere ottenere la versione ottimizzata a un prezzo speciale! Questa è la versione americana del gioco.

NL.name: Mega Man™ 4
NL.description: Een jaar na de gebeurtenissen in Mega Man 3 heerst er nog steeds vrede op aarde, maar de mysterieuze Russische wetenschapper Dr. Cossack kondigt zijn plannen aan om Mega Man uit te schakelen en te bewijzen dat hij de beste robotontwerper aller tijden is. Aan Mega Man de taak om dit te verijdelen! Mega Man 4 levert zelfs nog meer lastige platformactie en maar liefst acht nieuwe robotbazen om te verslaan. Bovendien kan Mega Man nu zijn Mega Buster-wapen opladen, waardoor hij grotere schoten kan afvuren die meer schade toebrengen. Als je deze titel hebt gekocht op je Wii™, kom je in aanmerking voor een speciale upgrade-prijs als je je gegevens overzet van Wii naar Wii U™. Dit is de Amerikaanse versie van het spel.

NZ.name: Mega Man™ 4
NZ.description: A year after the events of Mega Man™ 3, the world is still at peace. However, mysterious scientist Dr. Cossack announces his plan to eliminate Mega Man, and prove himself to be the greatest robot designer of all time. It's up to Mega Man to save the day once again! Mega Man 4 provides even more fiendish platform-action gameplay and eight new robot masters to defeat. PL.name: Mega Man™ 4
PL.description: A year after the events of Mega Man™ 3, the world is still at peace. However, mysterious scientist Dr. Cossack announces his plan to eliminate Mega Man, and prove himself to be the greatest robot designer of all time. It's up to Mega Man to save the day once again! Mega Man 4 provides even more fiendish platform-action gameplay and eight new robot masters to defeat. Mega Man now also has his Mega Buster to charge up energy, allowing him to fire larger and more damaging blasts. If you own this title on your Wii™, perform a system transfer from your Wii to your Wii U™ to receive a special upgrade price. This is the US version of the game.

PT.name: Mega Man™ 4
PT.description: Um ano depois dos acontecimentos de Mega Man™ 3, o mundo está ainda em paz. No entanto, o misterioso cientista Dr. Cossack anuncia o seu plano para eliminar Mega Man e, assim, assumir-se como o maior criador de robôs de sempre. Cabe a Mega Man salvar o dia uma vez mais! Mega Man 4 é um jogo de plataformas e ação emocionante em que deves derrotar oito novos Robot Masters. Agora, Mega Man também conta com o seu Mega Buster para recarregar energia, o que lhe permite disparar com mais potência e a uma maior distância. Caso já tenha adquirido este título para a sua Wii, faça uma transferência de dados da sua Wii™ para a sua Wii U™ com atualizações a um preço especial. Esta é a versão do jogo para os EUA.

RU.name: Mega Man™ 4
RU.description: Со времен событий, описанных в Mega Man™ 3, прошел год. Казалось бы, на Земле воцарился мир. Но не тут-то было... Таинственный ученый Dr. Cossack заявляет во всеуслышанье, что намерен истребить Mega Man и тем самым доказать, что он — самый гениальный конструктор роботов всех времен. Как всегда, только Mega Man под силу низвергнуть негодяя. В Mega Man 4 вас ожидает еще более напряженный экшн и 8 новых разновидностей кибернетических противников Robot Masters. Кроме того, в арсенале главного героя появилась пушка Mega Buster, стреляющая концентрированными зарядами энергии, и теперь Mega Man может нанести сокрушительный удар по врагу. Если вы приобрели игру на Wii™, вы можете передать ее на консоль Wii U™ и получить скидку на обновление игры до версии Wii U. Эта версия игры предназначена для продажи в США.
